about_the_game:
This VRC PRO Deluxe Asia on-road tracks pack gives you 5 additional, real existing on-road RC tracks from Asia continent.

✓ Expand your electric on-road tracks
✓ Experience real existing world class tracks
✓ Join more events & more multiplayer sessions

Having new on-road tracks is great fun and excellent for developing your RC racing skills. But even more so, it is a unique opportunity to experience these world-renowned RC racing tracks which most people only get to read about in magazines and on the Internet. Each of the tracks has hosted big, real life Worlds or European championships and huge Nationals.

Access to these tracks will also increase your ability to race others in multiplayer and online events.

DELUXE ASIA ON-ROAD TRACKS PACK:

  • Atsugi 2005
  • Tokyo SPL 1
  • Atsugi 2006
  • Kakegawa Tamiya
  • Hokusei

Your new tracks are automatically downloaded by the game, directly after your purchase.

Have fun!

name: VRC PRO Deluxe Asia On-road tracks

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy VRC PRO Deluxe Asia On-road tracks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP 3, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Hyperthreaded Intel CPU, AMD Athlon 64 CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Pixel Shader 2.0 graphics card (nVidia GeForce FX 5600 or ATI Radeon X600)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Windows 8, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Multi-core CPU (Intel Core i5 or i7, AMD Phenom II QUAD X4)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated RAM, Pixel Shader 3.0 graphics card (AMD Radeon HD 5870, nVidia GTX 560)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: VRC USB adapter or controller, for hosting multiplayer sessions high upstream connection is recommended
